duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide field training and supervision, ensuring adherence to safety policies, procedures, and PPE use.
Track and manage call-offs, quality issues, and morale among the hood cleaning team.
Ensure teams have necessary equipment/gear, clean and organized trucks, and conduct regular inventory assessments.
Uphold work shift, replace downed work in real time, and audibly dispatch teams as needed.
Lead initiatives such as building diagrams of exhaust systems for all customers.
Work mostly at night after facilities are closed, interacting professionally with restaurant staff, and performing inspections and cleanups.
Take photos of work, drive to and from jobs, fill out paperwork, and maintain truck and equipment.
Clean kitchen exhaust systems, work safely with ladders and chemicals, and get to pre-scheduled appointments on time.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field (Preferred)
